LibXC
-----

Description:
   Library of exchange-correlation functionals for density-functional theory (version 5.0.0)

Website:
  `http://www.tddft.org/programs/Libxc <http://www.tddft.org/programs/Libxc>`__

License:
   `MPL license (v. 2.0) <http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/>`__

   Dual license (BSD and GPL) for the Fortran module files libxcf90.f90 and libxc_funcs.f90
